snippet: The legislator, Gennadi V. Gudkov, crossed a political line in the sand when he joined crowds calling for the ouster of the Russian president.
abstract: Russian Parliament takes rare step and expels four-term lawmaker Gennadi V Gudkov, who crossed a political line in the sand in 2011 when he joined crowds calling for ouster of Pres Vladimir Putin.
lead_paragraph: The legislator, Gennadi V. Gudkov, crossed a political line in the sand when he joined crowds calling for the ouster of the Russian president.

headline.seo: Russian Parliament Expels Gennadi V. Gudkov, a Putin Opponent
headline.main: Lawmaker Who Defied Putin Is Expelled by Colleagues
headline.print_headline: Lawmaker Who Defied Putin Is Expelled by Colleagues
